20110129000223.000|20110129000223.000|CC1|ALIVE."                         
20110129000223.000|20110129000224.000|CC1|IT'S ON ANIMAL PLANET.          
20110129000224.000|20110129000226.000|CC1|HAVE YOU EVER SEEN THIS SHOW?   
20110129000226.000|20110129000228.000|CC1|THESE PEOPLE SHOULDN'T BE ALIVE.
20110129000228.000|20110129000229.000|CC1|[LAUGHTER]                      
20110129000229.000|20110129000230.000|CC1|IT'S A GOOD NAME, BECAUSE       
20110129000230.000|20110129000232.000|CC1|SERIOUSLY, EVERY WEEK PORTIA AND
20110129000232.000|20110129000233.000|CC1|I WATCH IT, AND EVERY TIME YOU  
20110129000233.000|20110129000237.000|CC1|THINK THAT IT CAN'T BE A WORSE  
20110129000237.000|20110129000238.000|CC1|STORY, WE JUST LITERALLY TURN TO
20110129000238.000|20110129000240.000|CC1|EACH OTHER, "THEY SHOULDN'T BE  
20110129000240.000|20110129000241.000|CC1|ALIVE."                         
20110129000241.000|20110129000242.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENS IS THESE PEOPLE    
20110129000242.000|20110129000243.000|CC1|THAT HAVE SURVIVED CRAZY THINGS 
20110129000243.000|20110129000245.000|CC1|TELL YOU IN THEIR OWN WORDS HOW 
20110129000245.000|20110129000246.000|CC1|THEY'VE LIVED THROUGH THINGS    
20110129000246.000|20110129000248.000|CC1|THAT THEY SHOULD NOT HAVE LIVED 
20110129000248.000|20110129000248.000|CC1|THROUGH.                        
20110129000248.000|20110129000250.000|CC1|I HAVE A STORY LIKE THAT.       
20110129000250.000|20110129000252.000|CC1|IT'S CALLED CHILDHOOD.          
20110129000252.000|20110129000252.000|CC1|[LAUGHTER]                      
20110129000252.000|20110129000253.000|CC1|BUT SERIOUSLY, THESE PEOPLE     
20110129000253.000|20110129000255.000|CC1|ARE -- THEY SHOULDN'T BE ALIVE. 
20110129000255.000|20110129000257.000|CC1|I CAN'T EVEN -- ONE GUY WILL -- 
20110129000257.000|20110129000258.000|CC1|IT'S RIDICULOUS.                
20110129000258.000|20110129000300.000|CC1|HE WAS SAILING -- HE WAS TRYING 
20110129000300.000|20110129000301.000|CC1|TO SAIL -- I DON'T KNOW --      
20110129000301.000|20110129000303.000|CC1|SOMEWHERE BY HIMSELF AND HE     
20110129000303.000|20110129000305.000|CC1|SHOULD NOT HAVE BEEN SAILING BY 
20110129000305.000|20110129000305.000|CC1|HIMSELF.                        
20110129000305.000|20110129000307.000|CC1|THE BOAT CAPSIZED IN THE MIDDLE 
20110129000307.000|20110129000308.000|CC1|OF THE ATLANTIC OCEAN AND HE HAD
20110129000308.000|20110129000310.000|CC1|TO SPEND 76 DAYS ON A RAFT IN   
20110129000310.000|20110129000311.000|CC1|THE ATLANTIC OCEAN.             
20110129000311.000|20110129000314.000|CC1|76 DAYS BY HIMSELF FLOATING ON A
20110129000314.000|20110129000314.000|CC1|RAFT CRAZY.

20110129000316.000|20110129000318.000|CC1|GUYS WERE ICE CLIMBING AND THEN 
20110129000318.000|20110129000320.000|CC1|THEY FELL INTO A CREVASSE, AND  
20110129000320.000|20110129000322.000|CC1|ONE GUY ACTUALLY DIDN'T MAKE IT.
20110129000322.000|20110129000324.000|CC1|THIS OTHER GUY MADE IT.

20110129000325.000|20110129000326.000|CC1|WERE SHIPWRECKED AND HAD TO     
20110129000326.000|20110129000331.000|CC1|FIGURE OUT HOW TO SURVIVE.

20110129000334.000|20110129000335.000|CC1|TALENT SHOW.

20110129000338.000|20110129000338.000|CC1|ISLAND."

20110129000341.000|20110129000343.000|CC1|SO GOOD, THEY'RE RE-ENACTING THE
20110129000343.000|20110129000344.000|CC1|ENTIRE EXPERIENCE AND THEY CUT  
20110129000344.000|20110129000346.000|CC1|BACK AND FORTH TO THE PERSON
